recipesJson.name: Cool Cactus
recipesJson.author: VaporDude
recipesJson.description: A delicious summer vape it's just refreshing on a hot summer day.

reviews.text: This will enter my summer rotation for sure
Wanted to try a cactus recipe so mixed this up right away and went through 30ml in no time. Made another batch and also gets better over a couple of days. Will be going in my rotation for sure
